## projects

SourceChecker: a Chrome extension that checks for links for reputability
Technotopia: a browser experiment in three.js and glitch art
Asian Diabetic Recipes: an Android app with diabetic-friendly Asian recipes
Trapped in Time: an adventure game inspired by 20th c. British playwrights
Password Manager Security: security analysis of browser auto-fills
Remove Sponsored: a Chrome extension to remove Facebook sponsored posts
Caves of the British Isles: a data visualization of caves across the UK
Spectre Exfiltration: optimizing a Spectre proof-of-concept
Sharynne Travels: documenting my travels during a semester in London
Hacker News Tab: a Chrome extension to view HN in your new tab
Nutrition AI: a nutrition predictor built using the Clarifai API
